description: This apartment is located just blocks from the new & upcoming Industry City, the "Hidden Gem" of Brooklyn. Nearby are subway's & water taxi's to Manhattan and city buses to travel locally around Brooklyn. The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, living room/dining room, 1 bathroom, 1 kitchen with full size refrigerator & sink, microwave, stove (no oven), pots/pans, plates, utensils, cups, bed & bath linens, pillows. Cable/wifi is included.
name: Quaint rental apartment
review: Place is very comfortable and clean. Has the transit system right by it. You can pretty much walk to a supermarket, bank, restaurants and the train station from here. Good spot to stay at and it is very quiet.
